page.title: 18WADEBRIDGE-A TOURIST CENTRE
page.content: {Wadebridge}is the{market town} for an area which depends on{tourism}to keep its economy going. Many of the traders in the town would find it difficult to remain in business without the income from summer visitors. In this area there are 3 large{caravan sites}at{ {Dinham, Bodieve and The Royal Cornwall {Show Ground}.At{Edmonton}a group of old cottages has been modernised and let as self catering accomodation Many households in the area advertise{ {"Bed and Breakfast"}and welcome visitors who are touring . On wet days in the summer the town of{Wadebridge}is packed with holiday makers who have come in from the coastal areas looking for something to do, and the town needs to provide more indoor facilities. The influx of large numbers of cars leads to traffic chaos in the town.
